meanings.definition: Of or relating to folk music or culture.
meanings.sent1: The folkiest songs are always so cheerful and easy to sing along to.
meanings.sent2: She wore the folkiest dress to the music festival, complete with flowers and embroidery.
meanings.sent3: The folkiest dancer at the party had everyone clapping and tapping their feet.
meanings.sent4: His house was the folkiest on the block, with hand-painted signs and wind chimes.
meanings.sent5: The folkiest traditions were passed down from generation to generation, keeping the culture alive.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'folky', meaning having the characteristics of folk music or culture.
meanings.sent1: This is the folkiest tune I've ever heard, with banjos and fiddles playing in harmony.
meanings.sent2: The folkiest artist in town always draws a crowd with their heartfelt lyrics and acoustic guitar.
meanings.sent3: She had the folkiest collection of vinyl records, spanning decades of folk music history.
meanings.sent4: The folkiest cafe in the city had live music every night, creating a cozy and welcoming atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: His storytelling was the folkiest of them all, weaving tales of love and adventure with every word.
